TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Lanngdun, title = Lanngdun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lanngdun} }

S.FORM: alang Lanngdun ga niya mki sku Nanto Keng atu Sin'iy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 312 buwan, 1,219 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 95% kyan ku 1,156 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 5% kyan ku 63 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 91%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lanngdun hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Lanngdun hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Lanngdun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Lanngdun hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Lanngdun hya' ga Naihunpu. tay 'llaw na Lanngdun hya' ga Qapuciu. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Lanngdon ga niya mki sko Nanto Keng ato Sin'iy go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 312 bowan, 1,219 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 95% kyan ko 1,156 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 5% kyan ko 63 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 91%, Tayan 2%, Amis 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Lanngdon hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Lanngdon hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Lanngdon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Lanngdon hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Lanngdon hya' ga Naihonpo. tay 'llaw na Lanngdon hya' ga Qapocio. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
